title: [Tower Hill, North Obelisk]
description: A black basalt obelisk is imbedded in the hilltop and stands as a shadow against the night sky.  Just to the south, at the very crest of the hill, rises a circular tower of granite blocks.  The northern ledge of the hill gives a fine vantage point from which to view the town laid out below.

A black basalt obelisk is imbedded in the hilltop and stands out starkly against the pale sky.  Just to the south, at the very crest of the hill, rises a circular tower of granite blocks.  The northern ledge of the hill gives a fine vantage point from which to view the town laid out below.
